mapper.update: insert into trans_req_mas ( coin_type, charge_cd, req_amt, charge_amt, tot_req_amt, send_coin, to_wallet_addr, dstnt_tag, depos_nm, phone_no, rsn_ctnt, device_type, referer_url, mod_dttm, prcs_cd, trade_price, client_ip, reg_dttm ) values ( #{coinType }, #{chargeCd }, #{reqAmt }, #{chargeAmt }, #{totReqAmt }, #{sendCoin }, #{toWalletAddr }, #{dstntTag }, #{deposNm }, #{phoneNo }, #{rsnCtnt }, #{deviceType }, #{refererUrl }, #{modDttm }, #{prcsCd }, #{tradePrice }, #{clientIp}, now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from trans_req_mas where phone_no = ${phoneNo} and (prcs_cd is null or prcs_cd not in ('6', '7')) order by reg_dttm desc limit 10
select count(1) from trans_req_mas where prcs_cd = '1'

SELECT a.reqno, coin_type, charge_cd, req_amt, charge_amt, tot_req_amt, send_coin, to_wallet_addr, dstnt_tag, depos_nm, phone_no, rsn_ctnt, device_type, referer_url, a.mod_dttm, prcs_cd, trade_price, a.reg_dttm, (select com_nm from com_cd_mas z where z.com_cd = a.prcs_cd and z.group_cd = 'prcs_cd') as prcs_nm, transaction_id, c.memo, trans_coin, client_ip, bank_cd, bank_account, trans_dttm FROM trans_req_mas a LEFT OUTER JOIN trans_rcpt_mas b ON a.reqno = b.reqno LEFT OUTER JOIN wlt_addr_mng c ON a.to_wallet_addr = c.wlt_addr WHERE a.reqno = #{reqno}
select count(*) as prcs_cd6_cnt , max(mod_dttm) as lst_rcpt_dttm from trans_req_mas where prcs_cd = '6' -- 거래완료 and phone_no = #{phoneNo}
